info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 8:32PM EDT until April 9 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston WV
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Muskingum River At McConnelsville affecting Morgan County.
For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Muskingum River at McConnelsville.
* WHEN...From Sunday morning to Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Flooding starts in cemetery on the southwest side of McConnelsville near State Route 376. More homes start to flood near the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to 11.3 feet late Sunday. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening to 10.9 feet Tuesday morning. It will then remain close to flood stage until early Wednesday. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.3 feet on 01/15/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.
The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 845 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING
